36
MAKING 
THE 
ENVIRONMENT A 
PRIORITY
“K&S believes business viability and growth can go hand-
in-hand with environmental sustainability. We re-think 
our systems approaches and use advanced technology 
powered by innovation to create a step change within our 
industry, building the green sustainability advantage and 
reducing our environmental footprint.”
- Nelson Wong,
Senior Vice President of Global Sales
